SocketAddress().Description: public abstract class SocketAddress@B_java#lang#Object_E@@B_java#io#Serializable_E@This class represents a Socket Address with no protocol attachment. As an abstract class, it is meant to be subclassed with a specific, protocol dependent, implementation. It provides an immutable object used by sockets for binding, connecting, or as returned values.
